name: The search for Professor Natuli
description:
The Professor has done it again. He has worked on an incredible project and is now mysteriously missing...

Embark on a quest to search for Professor Natuli and set things right from an experiment gone terribly wrong… A steampunk flavoured point-and-click adventure game with some action elements.

Play with mouse or touch (very small screen possible, but not recommended).

For action levels control player by placing the marker at the far end of screen in the direction you want the player to move – hold button to move faster.
